#include <iostream>
 
using namespace std;
 
int rev(int x)
{
    int num;
    int rev1=0;
          while(x!=0)
            {
                num = x%10;
                rev1 = (rev1*10) + num;
                x = x/10;
            }
            return rev1;
}
int main()
{
        int test;
        
        cin>>test;
        
		while(test--)
        {
            int a,b,num,rev1=0;
            
            cin>>a;
           
            for(b=(a+1);b>0;b++)
            {
                if(b == rev(b))
                {
                    break;
                }
            }
 
 
                cout<<b<<endl;
 
        }
}
